questions.text: List the company name, city, region, and country for customers from the USA.
questions.solution_query: SELECT CompanyName, City, Region, Country FROM Customers WHERE Country = 'USA'

questions.text: List the ProductID, ProductName, and UnitPrice for products with a unit price greater than $50.
questions.solution_query: SELECT ProductID, ProductName, UnitPrice FROM Products WHERE UnitPrice > 50

questions.text: List the EmployeeID, FirstName, LastName, and Title for employees who are Sales Representatives.
questions.solution_query: SELECT EmployeeID, FirstName, LastName, Title FROM Employees WHERE Title = 'Sales Representative'

questions.text: List the ProductID, ProductName, CategoryID, and UnitPrice for products in the 'Beverages' category.
questions.solution_query: SELECT ProductID, ProductName, CategoryID, UnitPrice FROM Products WHERE CategoryID = (SELECT CategoryID FROM Categories WHERE CategoryName = 'Beverages')

questions.text: List the CustomerID, CompanyName, and CreditLimit for customers with a credit limit above $50,000.
questions.solution_query: SELECT CustomerID, CompanyName, CreditLimit FROM Customers WHERE CreditLimit > 50000

questions.text: List the ProductID, ProductName, and UnitsInStock for products with fewer than 100 units in stock.
questions.solution_query: SELECT ProductID, ProductName, UnitsInStock FROM Products WHERE UnitsInStock < 100

questions.text: List the OrderID, OrderDate, and Status for all orders that are 'Pending'.
questions.solution_query: SELECT OrderID, OrderDate, Status FROM Orders WHERE Status = 'Pending'

questions.text: List the CompanyName, Country, and City for customers from Germany or France.
questions.solution_query: SELECT CompanyName, Country, City FROM Customers WHERE Country IN ('Germany', 'France')

questions.text: List the ProductID and ProductName for products containing 'Chocolate' in their name.
questions.solution_query: SELECT ProductID, ProductName FROM Products WHERE ProductName LIKE '%Chocolate%'

questions.text: List the CompanyName, ContactName, and ContactTitle for customers whose contact first name starts with 'A'.
questions.solution_query: SELECT CompanyName, ContactName, ContactTitle FROM Customers WHERE ContactName LIKE 'A%'

questions.text: List the OrderID, OrderDate, and CustomerID for orders placed between January 1, 1997, and June 30, 1997.
questions.solution_query: SELECT OrderID, OrderDate, CustomerID FROM Orders WHERE OrderDate BETWEEN '1997-01-01' AND '1997-06-30'

questions.text: List the EmployeeID, FirstName, and LastName for employees hired before January 1, 1995.
questions.solution_query: SELECT EmployeeID, FirstName, LastName FROM Employees WHERE HireDate < '1995-01-01'

questions.text: List the OrderID, CustomerID, and Freight cost for orders with a freight cost greater than $100.
questions.solution_query: SELECT OrderID, CustomerID, Freight FROM Orders WHERE Freight > 100

questions.text: List the SupplierID, CompanyName, and ContactName for suppliers located in the UK.
questions.solution_query: SELECT SupplierID, CompanyName, ContactName FROM Suppliers WHERE Country = 'UK'

questions.text: List the ProductID, ProductName, and Discontinued status for products that are currently discontinued.
questions.solution_query: SELECT ProductID, ProductName, Discontinued FROM Products WHERE Discontinued = 1
